content:
Air defense forces on the night of March 13 destroyed one managed aviation rocket over the Sea in the Odessa region.

About thisreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

“In the morning, the enemy directed the rocket strike in the morning. A managed aviation missile, released from a tactical aviation aircraft, destroyed air defense forces above the sea, ”the message reads.

The command noted that the enemy continues the tactics of point rocket strokes, testing and exploring air defense systems.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Russians againattackedThe local population of Kherson region is injured.
title: Airbout at night in Odesa region destroyed one managed aviation missile
